187981.「それでは 何をするのか 選んでくれ。\n<break>:
Let me know what you want to do.
<break>

188112.「おお そなたは防衛要請シートを持っているな。\n それを使えば 防衛成功の際に:
Oh, you have a defense request sheet... You can use it to get more defense medals than you usually get for a successful defense...
Can I use your defense request sheet?

188113.「……おっと。そなたは これ以上\n 防衛メダルを得ることが できないようだが\:
Ah...you're currently holding the maximum
amount of Defense Medals and can't get any
more. Do you still want to head out?
<yesno><break>

188114.「拠点には 防衛結界と呼ばれる \n 守らなくてはならぬ結界がある。\n これを:
The base has what we call defense wards. Wards that must be protected. If they're broken, our defenses will be... In addition,
there's a big monster in the defensive battle... The only way to win is to defend the wards until the enemy army retreats...

188115.「戦場には 魔物の集団が置いたと思われる\n 奇妙な鐘が 存在することがある。\:
On the battlefield, there are strange bells that are thought to have been placed there by a group of demons. These bells call forth
demons one after another. If you find one of these bells on the battlefield, you must destroy it at once. Otherwise, the danger
will increase.

188116.「防衛戦では 軍から支給するどうぐしか\n 使用することはできない。\n どうぐ:
In a defensive battle, you'll only be able to use military-issued gear... You'll also have your own special toolbox... You'll be able to
see what's in your kit when you're in the debriefing area... And during battle, they'll deliver supplies to the battlefield... We'll
use these as well... You can get them by touching them... You can then use them as needed from your kit...

188117.「敵軍には いくつかの兵団があるようだ。\n 現在 拠点を襲っている兵団の情報は:
The enemy army has several corps... Now, we're getting updates from our own troops on the ground... "Enemy forces under attack"...
However, depending on the situation on the ground, we may not be able to receive this information...

188118.「防衛軍では 数多くの実績を積み重ねた者に\n 『階級』を与えている。最初は『見:
In the Defense Force, those who accumulate the most achievements are given the rank of... You'll start as an apprentice... You
can see the specific details of your achievements by going to "View Achievement List", so take a look. As you rise in rank,
you will be granted privileges... To learn more about the privileges of your rank, go to "View Rank List".

188120.「戦場には 敵軍への対抗手段として\n 大砲が 配備されている。\n<br>\n:
On the battlefield, cannons are deployed as a countermeasure against enemy forces. Cannon shells are delivered directly to the
battlefield, so listen carefully to the instructions... The cannon shells in the kit can be used against the cannon... The
bombardment will take place at a specific point... We must look at the enemy's situation and use the right ammunition at the
right time. There are targets that appear at the point of impact, so you can see them in action.

188124.「ややっ！？ そなたの今の職業は \n レベル９０に 届いておらんようだな。\n:
What? Your current occupation doesn't even reach level 90. Then it's dangerous. I can't have you going into battle as a member of the
Defense Force. If you wish to join the Astoltia Defense Force, you must be at least level 90. We are waiting for you to join us!

188127.「他に 何か すべきことはあるか？\n<break>:
Is there anything else you need?
<break>

188128.「防衛要請シートを 使うのだな。\n 了解した。: Use the defense request sheet... Done...

188536.「そなたには まだ その特別報酬を\n 受け取る資格が ないようだ。\n 必要な:
You're not eligible for that special reward
yet. I'll come back to you when I've achieved
what I need to.<end>

188537.「……おっと。\n そうびぶくろが いっぱいではないか。\n 空きを作ってから:
...... I'll be back later. I'll make some
room and come back...<end>

188538.「その特別報酬\n <%sM_item>を\n 受け取るのだな？\n<yesno:
You'd like to me give you the
<%sM_item>?
<yesno><break>

188539.「了解した。受け取るといい。\n また 必要になったら 言ってくれ。\n 何度で:
Done... I'll take it... If you ever need
anything else, just let me know... I'll give
you more...<end>

188540.「どの特別報酬を 受け取りたいのだ？\n<break>:
Which special reward would you like to
receive?<break>

188548.「実績の中には 特に重要度の高いものがあり\n それを達成した者には 特別報酬が:
Some achievements are particularly significant, and those who achieve them will receive a special reward... To find out which
achievements are eligible for the special reward, go to "View Achievement List"... The special reward will be paid as often as you
need it, so please...

188805.「防衛要請シートを 使わないのか。\n まあ それも よいだろう。:
I don't use a defense request sheet. Well,
that's a good...

188806.「む……。\n そなたに 支給できる特別報酬は\n まだ ひとつも ないようだ。:
No... There is no special reward that I can offer you. Special rewards are offered to those who have achieved particularly
significant achievements... To see which achievements have earned you a special reward, go to "View Achievement List".

188807.「そなたは 初めての任務だな。\n 防衛軍の決まりを いくつか話しておこう。\n:
This is your first time... I'd like to talk to you about some of the rules of the Defense Force... In a defensive battle, you're only
allowed to use military-issued gear... You'll also need a special kit... You'll be able to see what's in your kit when you're in the
debriefing area... And when you're on the battlefield, you'll be wearing a uniform custom-made by the Defense Force... That's
what we're wearing here at headquarters. The purpose is to kill two birds with one stone... by making it easier to distinguish
between friend and foe... while at the same time boosting morale as a member of the Defense Force. ... Finally, we have our
mission statement. Listen carefully! Your mission is to serve as the advance troops to the base and defend the perimeter until the
enemy forces retreat. But you must not... You can't just run into enemy territory by yourself. You must always work together with
your comrades... ... I look forward to your work. I wish you good fortune and long life!

189229.「階級リストを表示するぞ: I'll show you a list of ranks

189230.「どの敵軍の 最速討伐情報を 見たいのだ？\n 冒険者の広場では 討伐タイムの\:
You want to see the fastest time to kill an enemy army? In the Adventurer's Square, you'll find information on the top 200
parties with the fastest times.

190956.「ふむ。やめると言うのだな。\n 参戦の意志が 固まったら 声をかけてくれ。\n:
Hmm. You say no... I'll call you when I'm
sure I'm ready to go... I'll be waiting!<end>

190959.「実績の中には 特に重要度の高いものがあり\n それを達成した者には 特別報酬が:
Some achievements are particularly significant, and those who achieve them will receive a special reward... To find out which
achievements will earn you a special reward, go to "View Achievement List"... The special reward will be paid as often as you need it,
so just tell me...

190960.「我が防衛軍では 隊員の\n 軍への貢献度を示す指標として\n 『実績』というも:
In our defense force, we have established "performance" as a measure of a member's contribution to the military... Achievements
are the important tasks that you are expected to perform during the defense of the country in order to determine the identity of the
enemy forces. There are certain achievements that are particularly important, and those who achieve them will receive special
rewards... I've compiled a list of these achievements... You should take a look at it.

190961.「防衛軍では 数多くの実績を積み重ねた者に\n 『階級』を与えている。\n<br:
In the Defense Force, those who accumulate the most accomplishments are given ranks... And with rank comes privilege... For more
information on the privileges of rank, please refer to the rank list... And remember, you start out as an apprentice... No matter who
you are, no exceptions.

192165.「おっと その前に……\n そなたに 伝えておくことがある。\n<br>\n「防:
Oh, but first... I have something to tell you. The Defense Force would like to recognize those who have defeated the enemy
forces the fastest. I hope this will inspire you! The records can be found under "See who killed the fastest"... We'll also be
announcing the top 200 parties in the Adventurer's Square! If you make it to the top of the list, would you mind if I shared
your information with the public?

193004.「む……。そなたは これ以上\n 持てない素材が あるようだが\n それでも 任:
Hmm... It looks like you're not able to hold
any more materials. Are you sure you still
want to head out?
<yesno><break>

194062.「現在 そなたの設定は\n 防衛軍では『<%sM_NAISYO_STATE>』の:
Currently, your setting is
"<%sM_NAISYO_STATE>" in the Defense Force...
Do you want to change the setting?<yesno><break>

194063.「了解した。\n 設定を『<%sM_NAISYO_STATE>』に変更したぞ。\:
Done... Change the setting to "<%sM_NAISYO_STATE>"... Note that once a record has been registered, you can't change
the display state of the name later...

194638.「了解した。そなたの設定は『<%sM_NAISYO_STATE>』だぞ。\n 設:
Done... Your settings are "<%sM_NAISYO_STATE>... You can change your settings in the "Name Disclosure Settings"
section of "View Fastest Defeaters"... Once a record has been registered, you cannot change the display status of the name...

200121.「……おっと。\n どうぐかばんが いっぱいではないか。\n 空きを作ってから:
...Oh. Your item bag is full. Make some room
and then please come back.
<end>

249351.「あろうことか 敵の全兵団によって\n 各拠点が 同時に 襲撃を受けているのだ。:
As it so happens, all of our bases are being
attacked at the same time! I'll need you to
choose which army you want to fight!
<break>
